name: Amalekites
blurb: Nomadic attackers who ambush Israel; God declares war against Amalek from generation to generation.

blurb: Pillage Ziklag; pursuit recovers all—new statute shares spoils with those who stay by the baggage.

searchText: hannah person narrative from bitter tears to theology in song. her vow yields samuel; her magnificat-like hymn celebrates god’s reversals—thrones topple, the lowly raised.
